categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 45

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 45 is the forty-fifth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with components for the left leg and the processor state indicator for the buildable R2-D2.
